alert.note: Alert for East Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 5:31PM CDT until August 25 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern East Carroll Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... West central Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 531 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mayersville, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lake Providence and Fitler around 535 PM CDT. Transylvania around 555 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
